verses.verse: ( The Conquest of Canaan Proceeds) ( 60 13:1-7 ) וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> way·hî - אַחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> ’a·ḥă·rê After מ֣וֹת <WH4194> mō·wṯ the death יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> yə·hō·wō·šu·a‘ of Joshua, וַֽיִּשְׁאֲלוּ֙ <WH7592> way·yiš·’ă·lū inquired בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> bə·nê the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ... בַּיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD, לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> lê·mōr ... מִ֣י <WH4310> mî “ Who יַעֲלֶה־ <WH5927> ya·‘ă·leh- to go up לָּ֧נוּ Prep│1cp ( lā·nū) for us אֶל־ 413 Prep ( ’el-) against הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֛י 3669 Art│N-proper-ms ( hak·kə·na·‘ă·nî) the Canaanites? ” בַּתְּחִלָּ֖ה 8462 Prep-b, Art│N-fs ( bat·tə·ḥil·lāh) will be the first לְהִלָּ֥חֶם 3898 Prep-l│V-Nifal-Inf ( lə·hil·lā·ḥem) and fight בּֽוֹ׃ Prep│3ms ( bōw)

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer answered יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD. יְהוּדָ֣ה <WH3063> yə·hū·ḏāh “ Judah יַעֲלֶ֑ה <WH5927> ya·‘ă·leh shall go up, ” הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> hin·nêh “ Indeed, נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> nā·ṯat·tî I have delivered אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> hā·’ā·reṣ the land בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> bə·yā·ḏōw into their hands. ”

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said יְהוּדָה֩ <WH3063> yə·hū·ḏāh Then the men of Judah לְשִׁמְע֨וֹן <WH8095> lə·šim·‘ō·wn the Simeonites, אָחִ֜יו <WH251> ’ā·ḥîw to their brothers עֲלֵ֧ה <WH5927> ‘ă·lêh “ Come up אִתִּ֣י <WH854> ’it·tî with us בְגוֹרָלִ֗י <WH1486> ḇə·ḡō·w·rā·lî to our allotted territory, וְנִֽלָּחֲמָה֙ <WH3898> wə·nil·lā·ḥă·māh and let us fight בַּֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <WH3669> bak·kə·na·‘ă·nî against the Canaanites. וְהָלַכְתִּ֧י <WH1980> wə·hā·laḵ·tî will go גַם־ <WH1571> ḡam- likewise אֲנִ֛י <WH589> ’ă·nî And we אִתְּךָ֖ <WH854> ’it·tə·ḵā with you בְּגוֹרָלֶ֑ךָ <WH1486> bə·ḡō·w·rā·le·ḵā to your territory. ” וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> way·yê·leḵ went אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> ’it·tōw with them. שִׁמְעֽוֹן׃ <WH8095> šim·‘ō·wn So the Simeonites

וַיַּ֣עַל <WH5927> way·ya·‘al attacked, יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> yə·hū·ḏāh When Judah וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> way·yit·tên delivered יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַכְּנַעֲנִ֥י <WH3669> hak·kə·na·‘ă·nî the Canaanites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֖י <WH6522> wə·hap·pə·riz·zî and Perizzites בְּיָדָ֑ם <WH3027> bə·yā·ḏām into their hands, וַיַּכּ֣וּם <WH5221> way·yak·kūm and they struck down בְּבֶ֔זֶק <WH966> bə·ḇe·zeq at Bezek. עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <WH6235> ‘ă·śe·reṯ ten אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> ’ă·lā·p̄îm thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> ’îš men

וַֽ֠יִּמְצְאוּ <WH4672> way·yim·ṣə·’ū they found אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - אֲדֹנִ֥י <WH137> ’ă·ḏō·nî vvv בֶ֙זֶק֙ <WH137> ḇe·zeq Adoni-bezek בְּבֶ֔זֶק <WH966> bə·ḇe·zeq And [there] וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֖וּ <WH3898> way·yil·lā·ḥă·mū and fought בּ֑וֹ Prep│3ms ( bōw) against him, וַיַּכּ֕וּ 5221 Conj-w│V-Hifil-ConsecImperf-3mp ( way·yak·kū) striking down אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י 3669 Art│N-proper-ms ( hak·kə·na·‘ă·nî) the Canaanites וְאֶת־ 853 Conj-w│DirObjM ( wə·’eṯ-) - הַפְּרִזִּֽי׃ 6522 Art│N-proper-ms ( hap·pə·riz·zî) and Perizzites.

וַיָּ֙נָס֙ <WH5127> way·yā·nās fled אֲדֹ֣נִי <WH137> ’ă·ḏō·nî , בֶ֔זֶק <WH137> ḇe·zeq As Adoni-bezek וַֽיִּרְדְּפ֖וּ <WH7291> way·yir·də·p̄ū they pursued him, אַחֲרָ֑יו <WH310> ’a·ḥă·rāw ... וַיֹּאחֲז֣וּ <WH270> way·yō·ḥă·zū seized him, אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> ’ō·ṯōw - וַֽיְקַצְּצ֔וּ <WH7112> way·qaṣ·ṣə·ṣū and cut off אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - בְּהֹנ֥וֹת <WH931> bə·hō·nō·wṯ his thumbs יָדָ֖יו <WH3027> yā·ḏāw ... וְרַגְלָֽיו׃ <WH7272> wə·raḡ·lāw and big toes.

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said אֲדֹֽנִי־ <WH137> ’ă·ḏō·nî- , בֶ֗זֶק <WH137> ḇe·zeq Then Adoni-bezek שִׁבְעִ֣ים׀ <WH7657> šiḇ·‘îm “ Seventy מְלָכִ֡ים <WH4428> mə·lā·ḵîm kings בְּֽהֹנוֹת֩ <WH931> bə·hō·nō·wṯ with their thumbs יְדֵיהֶ֨ם <WH3027> yə·ḏê·hem ... וְרַגְלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH7272> wə·raḡ·lê·hem and big toes מְקֻצָּצִ֗ים <WH7112> mə·quṣ·ṣā·ṣîm cut off הָי֤וּ <WH1961> hā·yū ... מְלַקְּטִים֙ <WH3950> mə·laq·qə·ṭîm have gathered [the scraps] תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> ta·ḥaṯ under שֻׁלְחָנִ֔י <WH7979> šul·ḥā·nî my table. כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ka·’ă·šer As עָשִׂ֔יתִי <WH6213> ‘ā·śî·ṯî I have done [to them], כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> kên so שִׁלַּם־ <WH7999> šil·lam- has repaid לִ֖י Prep│1cs ( lî) me. ” אֱלֹהִ֑ים 430 N-mp ( ’ĕ·lō·hîm) God וַיְבִיאֻ֥הוּ 935 Conj-w│V-Hifil-ConsecImperf-3mp│3ms ( way·ḇî·’u·hū) And they brought him יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם 3389 N-proper-fs ( yə·rū·šā·lim) to Jerusalem, וַיָּ֥מָת 4191 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·yā·māṯ) where he died שָֽׁם׃פ 8033 Adv ( šām) ....

וַיִּלָּחֲמ֤וּ <WH3898> way·yil·lā·ḥă·mū fought ( The Capture of Jerusalem and Hebron) ( 60 15:13-19) בְנֵֽי־ 1121 N-mpc ( ḇə·nê-) Then the men יְהוּדָה֙ 3063 N-proper-ms ( yə·hū·ḏāh) of Judah בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם 3389 Prep-b│N-proper-fs ( bî·rū·šā·lim) against Jerusalem וַיִּלְכְּד֣וּ 3920 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3mp ( way·yil·kə·ḏū) and captured it. אוֹתָ֔הּ 853 DirObjM│3fs ( ’ō·w·ṯāh) - וַיַּכּ֖וּהָ 5221 Conj-w│V-Hifil-ConsecImperf-3mp│3fs ( way·yak·kū·hā) They put [the city] לְפִי־ 6310 Prep-l│N-msc ( lə·p̄î-) vvv חָ֑רֶב 2719 N-fs ( ḥā·reḇ) to the sword וְאֶת־ 853 Conj-w│DirObjM ( wə·’eṯ-) - הָעִ֖יר 5892 Art│N-fs ( hā·‘îr) it שִׁלְּח֥וּ 7971 V-Piel-Perf-3cp ( šil·lə·ḥū) and set בָאֵֽשׁ׃ 784 Prep-b, Art│N-cs ( ḇā·’êš) on fire.

וְאַחַ֗ר <WH310> wə·’a·ḥar Afterward, יָֽרְדוּ֙ <WH3381> yā·rə·ḏū marched down בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> bə·nê the men יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> yə·hū·ḏāh of Judah לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <WH3898> lə·hil·lā·ḥêm to fight בַּֽכְּנַעֲנִ֑י <WH3669> bak·kə·na·‘ă·nî against the Canaanites יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> yō·wō·šêḇ living הָהָ֔ר <WH2022> hā·hār in the hill country, וְהַנֶּ֖גֶב <WH5045> wə·han·ne·ḡeḇ in the Negev, וְהַשְּׁפֵלָֽה׃ <WH8219> wə·haš·šə·p̄ê·lāh and in the foothills. ( Hebrew Shephelah or lowlands; that is, the western foothills of Judea)

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> way·yê·leḵ also marched יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> yə·hū·ḏāh Judah אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- against הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> hak·kə·na·‘ă·nî the Canaanites הַיּוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> hay·yō·wō·šêḇ who were living בְּחֶבְר֔וֹן <WH2275> bə·ḥeḇ·rō·wn in Hebron וְשֵׁם־ <WH8034> wə·šêm- known as חֶבְר֥וֹן <WH2275> ḥeḇ·rō·wn ( - לְפָנִ֖ים <WH6440> lə·p̄ā·nîm formerly קִרְיַ֣ת <WH7153> qir·yaṯ vvv אַרְבַּ֑ע <WH7153> ’ar·ba‘ Kiriath-arba ), וַיַּכּ֛וּ <WH5221> way·yak·kū and they struck down אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - שֵׁשַׁ֥י <WH8344> šê·šay Sheshai, וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - אֲחִימַ֖ן <WH289> ’ă·ḥî·man Ahiman, וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - תַּלְמָֽי׃ <WH8526> tal·māy and Talmai.

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> way·yê·leḵ they marched מִשָּׁ֔ם <WH8033> miš·šām From there אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- against יוֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> yō·wō·šə·ḇê the inhabitants דְּבִ֑יר <WH1688> də·ḇîr of Debir וְשֵׁם־ <WH8034> wə·šêm- known as דְּבִ֥יר <WH1688> də·ḇîr ( - לְפָנִ֖ים <WH6440> lə·p̄ā·nîm formerly קִרְיַת־ <WH7158> qir·yaṯ- vvv סֵֽפֶר׃ <WH7158> sê·p̄er Kiriath-sepher ).

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said, כָּלֵ֔ב <WH3612> kā·lêḇ And Caleb אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- “ To the man יַכֶּ֥ה <WH5221> yak·keh who strikes down אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - קִרְיַת־ <WH7158> qir·yaṯ- vvv סֵ֖פֶר <WH7158> sê·p̄er Kiriath-sepher וּלְכָדָ֑הּ <WH3920> ū·lə·ḵā·ḏāh and captures it, וְנָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> wə·nā·ṯat·tî I will give ל֛וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - עַכְסָ֥ה 5915 N-proper-fs ( ‘aḵ·sāh) Acsah בִתִּ֖י 1323 N-fsc│1cs ( ḇit·tî) my daughter לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ 802 Prep-l│N-fs ( lə·’iš·šāh) in marriage. ”

וַֽיִּלְכְּדָהּ֙ <WH3920> way·yil·kə·ḏāh captured [the city], עָתְנִיאֵ֣ל <WH6274> ‘ā·ṯə·nî·’êl So Othniel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- son קְנַ֔ז <WH7073> qə·naz Kenaz אֲחִ֥י <WH251> ’ă·ḥî brother כָלֵ֖ב <WH3612> ḵā·lêḇ of Caleb’s הַקָּטֹ֣ן <WH6996> haq·qā·ṭōn younger מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> mim·men·nū ... וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> way·yit·ten- and [Caleb] gave ל֛וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) to him אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - עַכְסָ֥ה 5915 N-proper-fs ( ‘aḵ·sāh) Acsah בִתּ֖וֹ 1323 N-fsc│3ms ( ḇit·tōw) his daughter לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ 802 Prep-l│N-fs ( lə·’iš·šāh) in marriage.

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> way·hî One day בְּבוֹאָ֗הּ <WH935> bə·ḇō·w·’āh [Acsah] came [to Othniel] וַתְּסִיתֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH5496> wat·tə·sî·ṯê·hū and urged him ( Hebrew; LXX and Vulgate and he urged her; see .) לִשְׁא֤וֹל <WH7592> liš·’ō·wl to ask מֵֽאֵת־ <WH854> mê·’êṯ- - אָבִ֙יהָ֙ <WH1> ’ā·ḇî·hā her father הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> haś·śā·ḏeh for a field. וַתִּצְנַ֖ח <WH6795> wat·tiṣ·naḥ When she got off מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> mê·‘al ... הַחֲמ֑וֹר <WH2543> ha·ḥă·mō·wr her donkey, וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ <WH559> way·yō·mer- asked לָ֥הּ Prep│3fs ( lāh) her, כָּלֵ֖ב 3612 N-proper-ms ( kā·lêḇ) Caleb מַה־ 4100 Interrog ( mah-) “ What לָּֽךְ׃ Prep│2fs ( lāḵ) do you desire? ”

וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> wat·tō·mer she answered ל֜וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) . הָֽבָה־ 3051 V-Qal-Imp-ms│3fs ( hā·ḇāh-) “ Give לִּ֣י Prep│1cs ( lî) me בְרָכָ֗ה 1293 N-fs ( ḇə·rā·ḵāh) a blessing, ” כִּ֣י 3588 Conj ( kî) “ Since אֶ֤רֶץ 776 N-fsc ( ’e·reṣ) land הַנֶּ֙גֶב֙ 5045 Art│N-proper-fs ( han·ne·ḡeḇ) in the Negev, נְתַתָּ֔נִי 5414 V-Qal-Perf-2ms│1cs ( nə·ṯat·tā·nî) you have given me וְנָתַתָּ֥ה 5414 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConjPerf-2ms ( wə·nā·ṯat·tāh) give לִ֖י Prep│1cs ( lî) me גֻּלֹּ֣ת 1543 N-fpc ( gul·lōṯ) springs מָ֑יִם 4325 N-mp ( mā·yim) of water [as well]. ” וַיִּתֶּן־ 5414 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·yit·ten-) gave לָ֣הּ Prep│3fs ( lāh) her כָּלֵ֗ב 3612 N-proper-ms ( kā·lêḇ) So Caleb אֵ֚ת 853 DirObjM ( ’êṯ) - גֻּלֹּ֣ת 1543 N-fpc ( gul·lōṯ) springs. עִלִּ֔ית 5942 Adj-fsc ( ‘il·lîṯ) both the upper וְאֵ֖ת 853 Conj-w│DirObjM ( wə·’êṯ) - גֻּלֹּ֥ת 1543 N-fpc ( gul·lōṯ) - תַּחְתִּֽית׃פ 8482 Adj-fs ( taḥ·tîṯ) and lower

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> ū·ḇə·nê Now the descendants קֵינִי֩ <WH7017> qê·nî the Kenite, חֹתֵ֨ן <WH2859> ḥō·ṯên father-in-law, מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> mō·šeh of Moses’ עָל֨וּ <WH5927> ‘ā·lū went up מֵעִ֤יר <WH5892> mê·‘îr from the City הַתְּמָרִים֙ <WH8558> hat·tə·mā·rîm of Palms ( That is, Jericho) אֶת־ <WH854> ’eṯ- with בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> bə·nê the men יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> yə·hū·ḏāh of Judah מִדְבַּ֣ר <WH4057> miḏ·bar to the Wilderness יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> yə·hū·ḏāh of Judah אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - בְּנֶ֣גֶב <WH5045> bə·ne·ḡeḇ in the Negev עֲרָ֑ד <WH6166> ‘ă·rāḏ near Arad. וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> way·yê·leḵ They went וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> way·yê·šeḇ to live אֶת־ <WH854> ’eṯ- among הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> hā·‘ām the people.
